code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SharedButton from'./SharedButton';import SharedInput from'./SharedInput';import{defaultRoutes}from'../mock/routes';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RouteSelection=_ref=>{let{onSelectRoute=()=>{},onBack=()=>{},operationType='import'}=_ref;const[routes,setRoutes]=useState(defaultRoutes);const[newRoute,setNewRoute]=useState('');const handleAddRoute=()=>{if(newRoute.trim()!==''){setRoutes([...routes,newRoute.trim()]);setNewRoute('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100 p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl border border-gray-200 w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-800 mb-8",children:["Selecciona una Ruta para ",operationType==='import'?'Importaci贸n':'Exportaci贸n']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4 mb-6",children:routes.map((route,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedButton,{onClick:()=>onSelectRoute(route),className:"bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200 border border-gray-200",children:route},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex space-x-2 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedInput,{placeholder:"Nueva ruta",value:newRoute,onChange:e=>setNewRoute(e.target.value),className:"flex-grow"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedButton,{onClick:handleAddRoute,className:"bg-red-800 text-white hover:bg-red-900 w-auto px-6",children:"Agregar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SharedButton,{onClick:onBack,className:"bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300",children:"Volver"})]})});};export default RouteSelection;
